description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission reference 18/0507/FUL dated 07/06/19 dated for 'Demolition of the existing house and erection of two detached houses with rooms in roofspace and basement level.' Variation to include: House 1 rear extension revised to remove the large full-width dog-leg section at ground floor. Rear extension depth also reduced; House 2 rear ground floor extension depth also reduced; Both house 1 and 2 move forward above ground (House 1 by 4.1m and House 2 by 2.85m); Minor changes to the front garden layouts required by the new house positioning on site; Minor changes to rear garden layouts required by the new position of the houses; Internal layouts revised in both houses and resulting slight changes to the position of windows; Addition of a sun room to the rear South corner of House 2 to match consented House 1; Omission of steps down from the sun room of house 1; Basement position revised slightly to protect tree RPAs (Houses 1 and 2); Revised shape of the central internal voids on House 1 and House 2; Revised roof light locations for house 1 and house 2; Revised doors at the rear elevation of the ground floor extension for house 1 and house 2; Realignment of dormers on flanks of both houses; Revision of internal layouts of both houses
